name: Zooooo! Miprophone's Adventure
description:
Miprophone is a loudly bird and all of his sheeeeeps have escaped and the only way to get them back is by using sounds to make them move!

Some sheeeeeps love loud sounds. Some sheeeeeps love low sounds. Can you control them all?

"For better gameplay experience shout Zooooo! to the mic"

Game developed for GMTK Game Jam 2020

Theme: Out of Control

Team: @miltonTouchdown, @mattkingz

Developed in 48 hours
